sentences.sContent: When he got bored he wandered around the fair.
sentences.sCn: 烦闷时，他便在集市上四处闲逛。

sentences.sContent: They wandered off in the direction of the nearest shop.
sentences.sCn: 他们朝着最近那家店铺的方向闲逛去了。
人们在街上漫无目的地闲逛。

remMethod.val: 去流浪 (wander) 吧， 途中会充满奇迹 (wonder)

words.tran: 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的
流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

trans.tranCn: 游荡； 漫步； 流浪
trans.tranOther: If you wander in a place, you walk around there in a casual way, often without intending to go in any particular direction
